mapper.insert: insert into item_order (user_id, item_id, order_create_time, item_price) value (#{userId}, #{itemId}, #{createTime}, #{itemPrice});
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, item_id, item_name, user_name as shopName, order_create_time, item_price, address, order_status from item_order, auction_item, auction_user_info where item_order.user_id = #{userId} and item_order.item_id = auction_item.item_id and auction_item.item_shop_id = auction_user_info.user_id
